lesson.subtitle: Figurative uses of motion verbs
lesson.description: Learner can recognize figurative uses of motion verbs
objectives: Learner can recognize figurative uses of motion verbs
Learner can use common idiomatic expressions with motion verbs
Learner understands the metaphorical extensions of motion prefixes
